text: agar tumhe dar ho ke yateem ladkiyo se nikaah kar ke tum insaaf na rakh sakoge, to aur aurto mein se jo bhi tumhe acchi lage tum un se nikaah karlo, do do, teen teen, chaar chaar se, lekin agar tumhe baraabari na kar sakne ka khauf ho, to ek hee kaafi hai, ya tumhaari milkiyath ki laundi, ye zyaada qareeb hai ke (aisa karne se na-insaafi aur) ek taraf jhuk padne se bach jaao
